name: Furniture_of_America_Posille_Contemporary_2-piece_Fabric_Sectional_and_Chair_Set
description:
Warm and inviting, this sectional and chair is a gorgeous set fit for any home looking to add cozy and welcoming colors. The high-density foam cushions offer plenty of relaxation while multiple cushions, some patterned and all plush, provide a stylish and comforting seating environment.
Set includes: One (1) L-shaped sectional and one (1) arm chairUpholstery color: GreyUpholstery material: FabricUpholstery fill: FoamVarious loose back pillows in matching grey while plenty of throw pillows add color and styleT-shaped seat cushions enhance the angled and padded arm restsArm chair features sleek track arms with barely-there welting trimFloral leaf print with complementary colors along entire arm chair exteriorHigh-density foam filling paired with sinuous wire no-sag springsSupported upon espresso finished wood block legsAll pieces crafted from solid wood for a long-lasting pieceMatching accent tables available, sold separatelyMade in USAFurniture Pattern: SolidMaterial: Fabric, Foam, WoodStyle: Casual, Contemporary, Modern, TransitionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredColor: Red, Grey, OrangeAll dimensions are approximateSectional seat dimensions: 19 inches high x 30 inches deepChair seat dimensions: 19 inches high x 21 inches deepChair dimensions: 35 inches high x 29 inches wide x 32 inches deepSectional dimensions: 40 inches high x 136 inches wide x 100 inches deepStyleCasual, Contemporary, Modern, TransitionalMaterialFabric, Foam, WoodAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGrey, Orange, RedFurniture PatternSolid
